column2: Grant §YTostig§! the §YKingdom of England§!, but under hefty §Ytribute§!.
Grant the §YDuchy of Normandy§! to §YHrolfr de Normandie§! and be immune to viking raids for §Y20§! years.
Play the §YDuke of Normandy§! as §YHrolfr de Normandie§!.
Danish workers have come over to help build up Normandy
[From.GetName] will buy a plot of land and build a castle within your domains.
Get 4 random buildings on one of your holdings.
Offer 500¤ to build a castle in Maine.
Offer 500¤ to build a castle in Perche.
You will no longer get Norman buffing events.
